mapper.select: select c.cart_id, c.pd_size, c.pd_quantity, p.pd_name, p.pd_price, p.pd_id, p.pd_color, p.pd_price, p.pd_img from cart c join products p on c.pd_id=p.pd_id where c.email=#{email} order by cart_id desc;
select * from cart where email=#{email} and pd_id=#{pd_id} and pd_size=#{pd_size};
mapper.update: update cart set pd_quantity=#{param2} where cart_id=#{param1};
update cart set pd_quantity=pd_quantity+1 where cart_id=#{param1};
